body:
Same issue over here I guess
I also receive the message, that cudart64_90.dll couldn't be found, althought I checked it- it's in there.

As the path is mentioned, I checked my paths:
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40840044/42293587-b8831e74-7fdb-11e8-945f-4e4f217ef73b.JPG)
![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40840044/42293591-bd270c42-7fdb-11e8-886a-4b674ac8c2cf.JPG)
![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40840044/42293592-bed1345a-7fdb-11e8-9b05-b0503c48483d.JPG)

So, could you kindly confirm, it's correct?
